title: Create cloud test auth setup
description:
Create script/helper to set up test authentication for wrangler dev testing.

Requirements:
- Script to create test user in D1 (via wrangler d1 execute)
- Script to create test token
- Script to create test board/project
- Output auth token and project ID for use in tests

Should work with wrangler dev's local D1 database.

Test: ./scripts/setup-cloud-test.sh outputs valid token
acceptance_criteria: Script creates test user/token/project in wrangler dev D1
closed_reason: Created setup-cloud-auth.sh script that creates test user, token, and board in local D1. Script is idempotent and generates .test-auth.env with credentials for tests.
